entries.title: Brazil to resume diplomatic relations with Venezuela under Lula
entries.description: Incoming left-wing president Lula has signalled he will seek to repair relations with the Maduro government.

entries.description: Supporters of the Atlas Lion laud team's run to the semifinals despite losing to holders France.

entries.title: Patriot systems would be legitimate target in Ukraine: Kremlin
entries.description: The comments come as US finalises plans to send the missile systems to intercept barrage of Russian missiles.

entries.title: Social media reacts after Morocco’s historic World Cup run

entries.title: US workers sue Georgia for transgender healthcare discrimination
entries.description: Three employees call for Georgia's state health insurance to cover gender-confirming healthcare and other procedures.

entries.title: Recap: France vs Morocco – World Cup 2022
entries.description: Defending world champions end Morocco's World Cup dreams and book their place in the final.

entries.title: Alleged attacker of Paul Pelosi spoke of ‘evil’ in Washington
entries.description: The US man who allegedly beat Nancy Pelosi's husband with a hammer during a home invasion has pleaded not guilty.

entries.title: France seal World Cup final spot with 2-0 win over Morocco
entries.description: Reigning world champions overcome spirited Atlas Lions display to setup showdown with Argentina on Sunday.

entries.title: Biden promotes partnerships with Africa at leadership summit
entries.description: US president announces new investments, trade deals in Africa, highlighting sustainable energy and infrastructure.

entries.title: Tesla shares at lowest level in two years as investors bash Musk
entries.description: The world's most valuable carmaker is one of the worst performing stocks among major automakers and tech firms.

entries.title: US Fed hikes interest rates by 0.5 percent, says more to come
entries.description: The US central bank projected interest rates rising to 5.1 percent in 2023, higher than what investors expected.

entries.title: What impact would an EU price cap on natural gas have?
entries.description: EU energy ministers fail yet again to agree on a price cap on Russian gas to punish Moscow.

entries.title: Istanbul mayor sentenced to prison for insulting public officials
entries.description: Court also imposes political ban on Ekrem Imamoglu, seen as a potential opponent of President Erdogan in 2023 elections.

entries.title: UN expels Iran from women’s rights body for protest crackdowns
entries.description: A US-drafted resolution to remove Iran from the Commission on the Status of Women passed over objections from Iran.

entries.description: Ex-President Pedro Castillo calls on supporters to go to prison where he is held as prosecutors seek 18-month detention.

entries.title: China removes 6 diplomats after Manchester consulate violence: UK
entries.description: Britain had requested they waive diplomatic immunity and be questioned by police over attack on pro-democracy activist.

entries.title: UN biodiversity talks hampered by ‘lack of political will’: WWF
entries.description: World Wildlife Fund urges more ambitious targets after developing nations stage COP15 walkout over funding plans.

entries.title: US marks 10-year anniversary of Sandy Hook school shooting
entries.description: The attack was one of the deadliest school shootings in modern US history, leaving 20 children and six educators dead.

entries.title: HSBC to stop funding new oil and gas projects

entries.title: What does the future hold for brain implant technology?
entries.description: Neurotech companies are making slow yet significant gains in converting thoughts into digital commands.

entries.title: As elections approach, Tunisian market shelves are still bare

entries.title: Kosovo officially applies for EU membership in symbolic act
entries.description: EU membership is currently out of reach for the country, which has been independent since 2008.

entries.description: Brussels hosts the leaders of Southeast Asian countries in the face of the Ukraine war and challenges from China.

entries.title: Ghana inflation soared to 21-year high above 50% in November
entries.description: Consumer inflation rise comes as the gold, oil and cocoa producer battles its worst economic crisis in a generation.

entries.title: Russia-Ukraine war reaches dark side of the internet

entries.description: The decision could leave hundreds of Moroccan fans stranded before a historic World Cup semifinal against France.

entries.title: Security guard dies at Lusail Stadium after fall

entries.title: Three parties sign coalition deal to form Latvia’s government
entries.description: The deal comes weeks after a general election that was shaped by Russia’s war in Ukraine and economic woes.

entries.title: How much should inequality be reduced?
entries.description: Most people agree that inequality is too extreme and needs to be reduced.

entries.title: US couple charged with ‘torture’ of their foster child in Uganda

entries.title: At least four people dead after boat capsizes in English channel

entries.title: NASA to run first global water survey from space
entries.description: Mission will conduct a comprehensive survey that aims to shed new light on mechanics and consequences of climate change.

entries.title: Climate justice needs more than a fund. It needs accountability

entries.description: If aid is not scaled up, famine is expected in southern Somalia between April and June 2023, humanitarians say.

entries.description: Analysts say Patriot capability would be 'significant' as Ukraine tries to protect civilians and key infrastructure.
